DataElement.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past One Month How Much Did Hearing Problems Interfere with Daily Activities Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past one month, how much hearing problems interfered with their daily activities, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: AYA-HEARS Past 30 Days How Much Did Hearing Problems Interfere with Daily Activities Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer._A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present._A question about how much an individual's hearing problems interferes or interfered with their daily activities._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to measure hearing loss or problems experienced by patients who have received treatment for cancer.

Property.preferredName: Past 30 Days How Much Did Hearing Problems Interfere with Daily Activities Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.:A question about how much an individual's hearing problems interferes or interfered with their daily activities.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 30 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Much Did Hearing Problems Interfere with Daily Activities
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual's hearing problems interferes or interfered with their daily activities.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: AYA-HEARS: Adolescent and Young Adult Hearing Screen, Version 1.0. Abby Rosenberg, Lillian Sung, Donna Lynn Johnston, Lindsey Frazier, 2016

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

PermissibleValues.value: Did not have hearing problems OR hearing problems did not interfere with activities
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Hearing Problems Did Not Interfere with Activities

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Hearing Problems Did Not Interfere with Activities
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual did not have hearing problems or hearing problems did not interfere with activities.

Concepts.longName: Hearing Problems Did Not Interfere with Activities
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual did not have hearing problems or hearing problems did not interfere with activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
